title: Cher Clueless Costume Officially Licensed Clueless Costume for Women
features: PRODUCT INCLUDES: This Clueless Cher Costume comes with a yellow plaid jacket and skirt and a tank top with sweater front.

FROM THE FUN COMPANY: We love movies, and as one of the world's top retailers of costumes our mission is to make high quality costumes from some of our all-time favorite films. This Clueless Costume for women is a great callback to the iconic 90s movie.

AUTHENTIC DETAILS: Cher in Clueless was obsessed with fashion and this costume is a perfect recreation of one of her famous outfits. It features a jacket and skirt combo in perfect yellow plaid, and a white tank that features a faux sweater front to recreate her style in detail.

HIGH QUALITY COSTUME: Most costumes are only designed for one-time use but ours use quality construction and durable materials to ensure customers get an extended life out of all of our products. With proper care, this Cher Costume will be ready for costume over and over again.
description: The Fun Costumes Cher Clueless Costume for Women We take movies seriously at Fun Costumes and we're proud to be one of the world's top designers of licensed costume styles. And that's why we're very happy to offer this exclusive Cher from Clueless Costume. Artfully and expertly designed right in our own costume design studios, this ensemble has the detail and quality that will let you play the part of Cher. "As if!" Product Design: This costume features a polyester jacket and skirt combo in yellow plaid. The jacket has princess seams and false pocket welts on the front. It has 3 decorative buttons at the center front that do not fasten as it is designed to be worn open. The skirt fits with an elastic back waistband and features 3 knife pleats and a solid yoke, it also features attached 2 kilt pins. The white pullover tank top features sweater panels attached at side and shoulder seams to complete the ensemble.
